H0.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Bethnal Green

H1.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Shoreditch

H2.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Spitalfields

H3.text: In which district of East London did Jack the Ripper operate. Whitechapel

A4.text: Jack the Ripper was an unidentified serial killer who was active in and around the impoverished Whitechapel district of London, England, in 1888.

A5.text: The killer was also called the Whitechapel Murderer and Leather Apron.
